description:
100% Open Source Toolkit for Large Language Models: Train, Tune, Chat on your own Machine

Transformer Lab is a free, open-source LLM workspace that you can run on your own computer. It is designed to go beyond what most modern open LLM applications allow. Using Transformer Lab you can easily finetune, evaluate, export and test LLMs across different inference engines and platforms.
What's Changed
- Add logo for tasks gallery and fix the tasks list visuals by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/863
- Added a Stopping message after clicking the stop button by @ParamThakkar123 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/865
- Changed /job routes in train.py to /experiments/jobs on frontend by @ParamThakkar123 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/851
- Fixes import on diffusion history page to allow history card to open by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/869
- Fix blank outputs in tasks terminal by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/866
- Add refresh button for models list on local models by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/867
- Fix for broken doc link by @josh-janes in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/872
- Show a skeleton while searching for the appropriate inference engine instead of the temporary error by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/871
- Change Tasks Job List to display Instance Name and User Info if available by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/839
- Fix wrong path in useAPI for outputmodal by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/870
- Fixed a broken link in Getting Started section by @defkorean in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/873
- Streaming Request Logs Fixes by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/846
- Fix login loader to keep showing logging in until auth/me is successful by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/864
- Fix broken docs links by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/874
- Add/resume training checkpoint by @mina-parham in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/828
- Add subtypes to jobs to show up filtered in Train, Eval and Generate Tabs by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/860
- Enable auto-teardown of instances by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/831
- Queue jobs to existing clusters by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/847
- Fixed Delay in cursor activation and typing in ModelGroups page by @ParamThakkar123 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/843
- Change model progress to track number of files downloaded by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/877
- Fixed system prompt reset functionality in All generation settings and interact page by @ParamThakkar123 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/838
- Add/audio stt by @mina-parham in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/719
New Contributors
- @josh-janes made their first contribution in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/872
- @defkorean made their first contribution in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/873
Full Changelog: https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/compare/v0.24.2...v0.25.0
